title: How the super-rich decorate a £1m nursery: from bespoke cots to the designer hired by the Beckhams
text:
Having a baby and not started on the nursery yet? Let us make some (eye-wateringly expensive) suggestions…

Ever since Beyoncé spent £30k on a solid gold rocking horse for her firstborn Blue Ivy’s bedroom, the bar for a baby’s nursery room has been set sky high.

These days, a stylish nursery has become a symbol of success for modern mothers, sometimes to create a sense of ‘one-upmumship’ that can be hash-tagged on Instagram, but mainly to provide a unique, individual setting where a baby can thrive.

From status symbol cots favoured by Elton John, to bespoke hand-painted murals and stuffed animals, we’ve rounded up the key purchases every nursery needs.

The Cot
description: Having a baby and not started on the nursery yet?
